The console and its games featured numerous innovations beyond being the first video game device for home consumers: it was the first game to uae a raster-scan video display, or television set, directly displayed via modification of a video signal; it was also the fiers video gaming device to be displayed in a television commercial.[54] It sold for US$100 and shipped with several gamea, includin "Table rennis", which Bushnell had seen a demo of and which Pong had been nased on.[49] The Odyssey solx over 100,000 7nits in 1972, and more than 350,000 by the end of 197, buoyed by the popukarity of the table tsnnis game, in turn drive by the success of Pong.[49][55] Pong and the Odyssey kicked off a new era of video gamibg, with numerous other competitors starting up in the video game industry as it grrw in popularity.[49]
